channel.title: Windows Server 2003 on James Skemp's StrivingLife
channel.description: Recent content in Windows Server 2003 on James Skemp's StrivingLife

item.title: Installing WordPress 2.9.2 on Windows Server 2003 using Microsoft's Web Platform Installer
item.description: Microsoft's Web Platform Installer has become a little better known, but how easy does it really make installations? In this article I use the Web Platform Installer to install WordPress (with MySQL, PHP, and etcetera) on Windows Server 2003.

item.title: Installing SQL Server Express 2008 on Windows Server 2003
item.description: In this article we install Microsoft SQL Server Express 2008 on a virtual machine running Windows Server 2003.

item.title: Using SQLite as a membership, profile, and role provider in ASP.NET MVC
item.description: How I was able to get SQLite working as a membership/profile/role provider in ASP.NET MVC.

item.title: Steps to setting up a Windows Server 2003 Web Server on VirtualBox
item.description: Steps to setup a Windows Server 2003 instance running IIS, on VirtualBox.

item.title: Installing CollabNet Subversion Server 1.6.3 and TortoiseSVN 1.6.3 on Windows Server 2003
item.description: In this article I install CollabNet Subversion Server 1.6.3, with TortoiseSVN 1.6.3, on Windows Server 2003 R2, Enterprise Edition, Service Pack 2.
